Package com.jgaap.eventSets

Class Summary
BlackListEventSet Filters all Event strings against named file and removes named events.
CharacterBiGramEventSet Extract bigrams of characters as features.
CharacterEventSet This event set is all individual characters, as determined by the preprocessing applied in the previous stage.
CharacterTetraGramEventSet Extract character 4-grams as features.
CharacterTriGramEventSet Extract character trigrams as features.
CommonWordEventSet Extract the 50 most common words across the entire corpus as features.
FreqEventSet Corpus frequencies taken from English Lexicon Project.
MostCommonEventSet Deprecated.
MWFunctionWordsEventSet Uses function words as defined by Mosteller-Wallace in their Federalist papers study.
NaiveWordEventSet Extract whitespace-separated words (including punctuation) as features.
NamingTimeEventSet Naming times taken from English Lexicon Project.
NGramEventSet This event set is N-grams (parameterized as N) of an underlying event model (parameterized as underlyingevents)
NullEventSet Deprecated.
NumericTransformationEventSet Deprecated.
ReactionTimeEventSet Reaction times taken from English Lexicon Project.
TransformationEventSet Transforms Event strings for other Event Strings in generation.
WhiteListEventSet Filters all Event strings against named file and removes unlisted events.
WordBiGramEventSet Extract word bigrams as features.
WordLengthEventSet Extract number of characters in each word as features.
WordSyllablesEventSet This event set is the number of syllables in a given word, defined (naively) by the number of vowel clusters.
WordTetraGramEventSet Extract 4-grams of words as features.
WordTriGramEventSet Extract tri-grams of words as features.
